overview: Mimdich world want mimdich becomes the best city in the world. This is no easy task, and therefore, we worked day and night to meet this goal. We are in beta release means that for some time, you’ll find some design changes, different applications … whose raison is simply to get to that goal. Being at this stage means that you are not the final version, there is a lot more waiting and of course, expect your suggestions, in fact! Mimdich you creat it!, So that in the end is your town online. A place of escape and release of tension.
